Name: Task Event Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the messages for task related events.

TaskStarted.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has started.
TaskStarted.Message: The task with Id '%1' has started.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has started.

TaskCompletedOK.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has completed.
TaskCompletedOK.Message: The task with Id '%1' has completed.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has completed.

TaskCompletedWarning.Description: A task has completed with warnings.
TaskCompletedWarning.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has completed with warnings.
TaskCompletedWarning.Message: The task with Id '%1' has completed with warnings.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has completed with warnings.

TaskAborted.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has been aborted.
TaskAborted.Message: The task with Id '%1' has been aborted.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has been aborted.

TaskCancelled.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has been cancelled.
TaskCancelled.Message: The task with Id '%1' has been cancelled.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has been cancelled.

TaskRemoved.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has been removed.
TaskRemoved.Message: The task with Id '%1' has been removed.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has been removed.

TaskPaused.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has been paused.
TaskPaused.Message: The task with Id '%1' has been paused.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has been paused.

TaskResumed.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has been resumed.
TaskResumed.Message: The task with Id '%1' has been resumed.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has been resumed.

TaskProgressChanged.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a task has changed progress.
TaskProgressChanged.Message: The task with Id '%1' has changed to progress %2 percent complete.
ArgDescriptions: The percent completion of the task.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the task resource that has changed progress.
This argument shall contain the percent completion of the task that has changed progress.
